name: Blind For Love
description:
GMTK 2021 GAME JAM Work

It's a game about two light bulbs. They would like to see each other even lose their light and life. When they all plugged, there will have the light on but they can not move. So this time they would like to give up their light and willing to find their love even as the blind. 

Credits:

BBQ - Designer, Programmer

Ryoko - Art

Eden - Level Designer

Candice - Level Designer
